attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The charge is that bankers:
1. Were greedy, decided to invest (or gamble) rather than do what they should, i.e. make loans.
2. Traded investments they didn't understand but claimed to be brilliant and took payment accordingly.
3. Mis-valued investments.
3. Lied in annual reports about the controls they had in place.
4. Therefore breached the Companies Act.
They should therefore be prosecuted, fined and sent to jail. Also, their auditors, who approved their accounts and balance sheets and said the banks were "going concerns"!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
